summary: This is a brief email exchange between two officials at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The Chief of the Criminal Division requests to touch base on Epstein, and an Associate U.S. Attorney agrees to meet.

persons.name: Associate U.S. Attorney, SDNY
persons.context: The recipient of an email from the Chief of the Criminal Division, who agrees to meet to discuss Epstein.

persons.name: Chief, Criminal Division United States Attorney's Office, SDNY
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting to touch base on Epstein with an Associate U.S. Attorney.

connections.person1: Chief, Criminal Division United States Attorney's Office, SDNY
connections.description: Colleagues within the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, communicating about the Epstein case.

events.title: SDNY officials discuss Epstein case
events.description: The Chief of the Criminal Division at the SDNY U.S. Attorney's Office emails an Associate U.S. Attorney to request a meeting to discuss Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Chief, Criminal Division United States Attorney's Office, SDNY

keyFacts: The email exchange occurred on July 16, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
The communication is between high-level officials in the SDNY U.S. Attorney's Office, indicating active internal discussion of the Epstein case.
The subject of the email is 'Re:', suggesting it is part of an ongoing chain of correspondence about Epstein.
